home.welcome_description: Manage inspections, track progress, and scan your project QR codes effortlessly and efficiently.
home.scan_subtitle: Click here to update your progress

manual_entry.title: Manual Entry
manual_entry.description: Fill in the drawing number manually.

scan_result.title: Scan Result
scan_result.error_message: Please check the QR code and try again. If the problem persists, contact your leader.
scan_result.error_note: You may also try scanning again or use manual enter the QR code.

edit_progress.title: Edit Progress
edit_progress.subtitle: Update the current process and progress of the product
edit_progress.product_info_note: These details are pulled from the scanned QR code and are not editable.
edit_progress.progress_note: Select the current process and update the progress value below.

login.title: Log in
login.subheading: Stay informed, stay productiveâ€”track progress anytime, anywhere with <0>MoPro</0>.

email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.scan_qr: How do I scan a QR code?
faq.scan_qr_answer: Go to the Scan tab and point your camera at the QR code.
faq.view_history: Where can I view my scan history?
faq.view_history_answer: You can view your scan history from the home screen.
faq.reset_password: How can I reset my password?
faq.reset_password_answer: Go to your profile and select 'Change password'.

contact.title: Contact Support
contact.company: KHI Design and Technical Services, Inc.

user_guidelines.title: User Guidelines
user_guidelines.intro_description: This guide will help you understand how to navigate and use the app effectively.
user_guidelines.general_item_1: Use the QR scanner to update your progress.
user_guidelines.general_item_5: Log out when done using a shared device.
user_guidelines.troubleshooting_item_1: Try better lighting if scanning fails.
user_guidelines.troubleshooting_item_2: Clear cache if you experience issues.
user_guidelines.support_description: Visit Help & Support in the menu to reach out or view FAQs.

successModal.title: Progress Saved
successModal.subtitle: Your updates have been successfully saved.

change_password.password_instruction: For your account's security, please enter your current password and choose a new one.

error.error_generic: Failed to change password. Please try again.
